extension.summary: Fetches selected games from Batocera and RetroPie and displays them in a Kodi widget
extension.description: Searches through gamelist.xml files in the roms directory for emulationStation-based systems like Batocera and RetroPie and displays favorited or latest games with their thumbnails and metadata as a selectable video widget.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.disclaimer: This addon only works if used ontop of an EmulationStation-based distro like Batocera or RetroPie. May work with other ES-based setups such as ES-DE or RetroBat, but no guarantee is given.
extension.news:
v0.3.1 (2025-02-11) - Added wheel as clearart
v0.2.1 (2024-11-01) - Separate widgets for favorites and latest added games. - Added support for RetroPie. - Implemented custom romdir. - Implemented custom run command. - Added option in settings to force a rescan.
v0.1.1 (2024-10-27) - Mostly works. Added support for RetroPie as well as Batocera. May work for other EmulationStation-based systems.
